ref: 9781 madgura m. ʻ the fish Macropteronatus magur ʼ Bhpr., ˚aka -- , maṅgura -- m. lex.
Pa. maggura -- m. ʻ a kind of fish ʼ;
B. māgur ʻ the fish Silurus pelorius ʼ;
Or. māgura ʻ the scaleless freshwater fish Clarius magur ʼ;
Bhoj. mã̄gur ʻ a kind of fish ʼ;
H. magurī f. ʻ the fish Macropteronatus magur or Silurus pelorius ʼ;
Si. magurā ʻ a river fish, skeat -- fish ʼ.
